General.Name: Ningbo Construction Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Construction Co., Ltd. engages in civil engineering construction business in China. It is involved in the design, construction, and installation of housing projects, municipal roads, and bridges, as well as building decoration; and design and construction of building curtain walls, ready-mixed commercial concrete, cement prefabricated components, steel structures, prefabricated buildings, etc. The company also undertakes various general contracting works, such as municipal engineering, municipal public works construction, mechanical and electrical installation engineering construction, chemical engineering construction, and landscaping engineering, as well as manufactures, processes, and installs building components. In addition, it provides property management, and construction machinery and equipment leasing services, as well as mechanical equipment and accessories; and sells building materials. The company was founded in 1951 and is based in Ningbo, China.
